title: Topic 002 Question 017
body: You have an Azure IoT solution that includes an Azure IoT hub, a Device Provisioning Service instance, and 1,000 connected IoT devices. The IoT devices are allocated to four enrollment groups. Each enrollment group is configured to use certificate attestation.
You need to decommission all the devices in a single enrollment group and the enrollment group itself.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
